takeaways.title: Infinity is the hook
takeaways.detail: Most discussion clusters around infinity and its implications (145 mentions), with a lot of follow-up questions.

takeaways.title: Highly technical audience: lots of questions
takeaways.detail: Questions show up in 28% of comments (248). Consider adding a short recap section with the key definitions/assumptions.

takeaways.title: Secondary clusters are core physics primitives
takeaways.detail: Beyond infinity, the most common threads are about electrons, mass, and energy (often as a unit).
